Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Rogue[/b] | Noncreature spells you cast on other player's turns cost {1} less to cast.
[b]Wizard[/b] | Noncreature spells you cast on your turn cost {1} less to cast.
